TextLibrary.Text: Lord Greythane, we seek a Knight from these parts.
Lord Greythane, we seek a Knight from these parts.
Lord Greythane, we seek a Knight from these parts.
Lord Greythane, we seek a Knight from these parts.
We don't know that, sir. But he wears a large helm with a plume fashioned from the crest of a giant minotaur.
We don't know that, sir. But he wears a large helm with a plume fashioned from the crest of a giant minotaur.
We don't know that, sir. But he wears a large helm with a plume fashioned from the crest of a giant minotaur.
We don't know that, sir. But he wears a large helm with a plume fashioned from the crest of a giant minotaur.
Ah... you seek Sir Borik. He is not a knight of the Riverguard any longer, but we know him well - he is a fearsome warrior. You will find him in Drakenburg.
